resources.string:
"Frequently asked questions 


"
"Question: What is the difference between the different levels?
" "Answer 
" "Each level has a different amounts of words and amount of categorization of the words and timer length. 

" "EASY - 100% OF THE WORDS, 4 Categories and 18 minutes 
" "NORMAL - 100% OF THE WORDS, 3 Categories and 17 minutes 
 " "HARD - 75% OF THE WORDS, 3 Categories and 16 minutes 
" "INSANE - 50% OF THE WORDS, 2 Categories and 15 minutes 
" "IMPOSSIBLE - 25% OF THE WORDS, 0 Categories and 14 minutes 


"
"Question: Can I pick the song? 
" "Answer:
" "No! That would be too easy ;-) 


"
"Question: How many attempts do I get to guess? 
" "Answer:
" "No! That would be too easy ;-) 


"
